section.title: RegExpValidator
section.para: The text validator treats each rule line as a regular expression and checks if the response message matches that regular expression. The response message must match all lines in order to be successfully validated.

note.para: Please note that the value of pattern is passed through a template engine. The benefit of this is the ability to use standard properties in the pattern like ${prop1} and @{prop2}. The disadvantage is that each backslah character used to escape an RegExp character needs to be escaped as well. In reality this means that instead of writing \. to escape the dot character, one need to enter \\..
